attributes.action: Ensure the tax on house hold waste and rubbish does not become legal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reasons for this are numerous and it points to unnecessary burden to consumers and citizens. Junk mail and excessive packaging(Health & Safty!) leads to consumer tax liability. Change packing laws Not Tax the customer. Citizens of crime you receive a "victim pack" it weighs over 180 grams that is more than 3 oz. Tax the victim wrong again! The policies point the wrong direction TAX!MONEY! People stop this extension of MP failure

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
